location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: blueprint on tracing paperDimensions: 660 x 510mm on sheet 690 x 540mm

mods.abstract: Map showing the second of two proposed concession areas which Petroleum Concessions Limited (PCL) hoped to acquire from the Shaikh of Bahrain, identified as 'Leased Area No. 2'.The leased area which the Company hopes to acquire is marked with red line and covers the Hawar group of islands and Fasht ad D'bal [Fasht ad DÄ«bal]. The map also shows the bottom right corner of Leased Area No. 1.Part of Admiralty Chart No. 2837B.Longitude and latitude lines are marked on the map.
